lore: Far from trusting the God of Fire, Zonte created the Efreets with an innate and relentless hatred towards Djinns. In his first attempt, the legendary Mage was too ambitious in his calculations, which caused this hatred to be replaced in the Obsidian Efreet by an imperious necessity to destroy them. They can feel the presence of Djinns and create portals to their location through the ashes of their enemies.
menagerieDialog: I have a confession to make. I accidentally set one of the other creatures on fire earlier while you were away.
You can catch just about anything on fire if you set your mind to it, really.
Many people often confuse Efreets with Djinns. The difference between the two is that Efreets are much smarter and more handsome than Djinns.
Fire solves everything. If you need me to take care of someone for you, just say the word.
name: Obsidian Efreet
